CatDescriptText: Cutline of related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 29, 1961, pg. 24, reads: "Nine Negroes Among 22 Steeler Hopefuls - "Here, on the campus of Slippery Rock State Teachers College, Tuesday morning, the eager but cold eyes of Coach Buddy Parker were weighing the muscular symphony of 22 individual 1961 Pittsburgh Steelers' rookies, nine of whom were young men of color..."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Steelers football player, no. 76 Eugene "Big Daddy" Lipscomb, standing with young boy on his shoulders, on athletic field at Slippery Rock State Teachers College
CatSubject_tab: Boys--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Men--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Football players--Pennsylvania--Slippery Rock.Pittsburgh Steelers (Football team).Slippery Rock State Teachers College.
